text: Wait for how long? Live chat cs inform them to claim

Dear sticker drivers Sticker verification for the month of June has been extended to 18th June 2359hrs.Please head to the "Sticker" Tab under your driver profile page in the driver app to submit the 3 photos by 18th June 2021 if you have yet to do so to receive the monthly ad fee or your account may be suspended.Please ensure that the sticker  license plate and sign of the month can be seen CLEARLY in EACH photo.Photos taken from another device will not be accepted.Thank you.
